description: OIG API-Only Resources Configuration - Labels and Resource Owners

definitions.name: Privileged
definitions.description: High-privilege access requiring enhanced monitoring and approval

definitions.name: Standard
definitions.description: Standard user access with normal approval workflows

definitions.name: Sensitive-Data
definitions.description: Access to sensitive or regulated data (PII, PHI, financial)

definitions.name: Compliance-Required
definitions.description: Access subject to compliance requirements (SOX, HIPAA, etc.)

rules.description: Auto-apply Privileged label to resources with 'admin' in the name
Super admin access requires both Privileged and Compliance labels

notes: This configuration manages OIG resources that are API-only (not yet in Terraform provider)
Labels help categorize access for governance workflows, access reviews, and compliance
Labels and Resource Owners are managed via API (this config file)
